√dhāv2 'rinse'

present: [1.] dhā́vati etc.  dhā́vate etc. V.+  

perfect: dadhāva  dadhāvire  

aorist: [5.] adhāviṣṭa (3s.)  

verbal: dhautá SV.+  dhautvā?  -dhāvya  

secondary: passive: dhāvyate   -- causative: dhāvayati etc.  dhāvayate etc. B.+  

derivatives: dhāva  dhāvaka E.  -dhāvin C.  dhā́vana B.+  dhautí RV.  dhā́rā? V.+  

Perhaps rather related with √dhū than with √1dhāv.
